items.title: Use task targets for repeatable actions

narrative.Overview: Always use `task` targets defined in Taskfile.yml for repeatable actions rather than documenting raw shell commands. This ensures consistency and maintainability across the project.

All commit messages must follow the Conventional Commits specification (https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/). This enables automated changelog generation and semantic versioning. Format: `type(scope): description`. Common types: feat, fix, docs, refactor, test, chore. Examples: 'docs: update spec', 'feat(api-go): add validator'.
